mapper.select: select dt.DEPT_BOSS_ID, dt.DEPT_ID from EMPLOYEES_INFO_TABLE eit left join DEPARTMENT_TABLE dt on eit.DEPT_ID = dt.DEPT_ID where eit.EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from EMPLOYEES_INFO_TABLE et where EMP_INFO_KEY = (select LEADER from EMPLOYEES_INFO_TABLE eit where EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from EMPLOYEES_INFO_TABLE where EMP_ID like concat(concat('%',#{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into EMPLOYEES_INFO_TABLE
empInfoKey, empId, deptId, postId, empName, empSex, empState, empEntryTime, empIdentifyType, empIdentifyNumber, empPhoneNumber, empEMail, empNation, empNativePlace, empBirthday, empLocation, empEduBgd, empEntryWay, empEduSchool, leader,
EMP_INFO_KEY = #{empInfoKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_SEX = #{empSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_STATE = #{empState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_ENTRY_TIME = #{empEntryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_IDENTIFY_TYPE = #{empIdentifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_IDENTIFY_NUMBER = #{empIdentifyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_PHONE_NUMBER = #{empPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_E_MAIL = #{empEMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NATION = #{empNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NATIVE_PLACE = #{empNativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_BIRTHDAY = #{empBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_LOCATION = #{empLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_EDU_BGD = #{empEduBgd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_ENTRY_WAY = #{empEntryWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_EDU_SCHOOL = #{empEduSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update EMPLOYEES_INFO_TABLE
EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_SEX = #{empSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_STATE = #{empState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_ENTRY_TIME = #{empEntryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_IDENTIFY_TYPE = #{empIdentifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_IDENTIFY_NUMBER = #{empIdentifyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_PHONE_NUMBER = #{empPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_E_MAIL = #{empEMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_NATION = #{empNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_NATIVE_PLACE = #{empNativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_BIRTHDAY = #{empBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_LOCATION = #{empLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_EDU_BGD = #{empEduBgd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_ENTRY_WAY = #{empEntryWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMP_EDU_SCHOOL = #{empEduSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where EMP_INFO_KEY = #{empInfoKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update EMPLOYEES_INFO_TABLE set EMP_ID = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NAME = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_SEX = #{empSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_STATE = #{empState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_ENTRY_TIME = #{empEntryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_IDENTIFY_TYPE = #{empIdentifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_IDENTIFY_NUMBER = #{empIdentifyNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_PHONE_NUMBER = #{empPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_E_MAIL = #{empEMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NATION = #{empNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NATIVE_PLACE = #{empNativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_BIRTHDAY = #{empBirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_LOCATION = #{empLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_EDU_BGD = #{empEduBgd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_ENTRY_WAY = #{empEntryWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_EDU_SCHOOL = #{empEduSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where EMP_INFO_KEY = #{empInfoKey,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
